document_data.name: Dragon's Flame
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Dragon's Flame''''' was the famed flagship of [[Westgate]]'s navy in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The vessel was considered to be one of the most expensive ships that had ever sailed across [[Dragonmere]]. The ''Dragon's Flame'' was bedecked in [[gold]] and [[silver]] platings and its sides were decorated with intricate and lavish trimmings.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the ''Dragon's Flame'' was renowned for being a moving piece of dazzling propaganda and advertisement for the economic power and wealth of the city of Westgate. A miniature copy of the ship was proudly displayed in the office of the Harbormaster in Westgate's [[Harbor Loop]]. The office was open to the public and served as a miniature museum of various symbols of the past conflicts and displays of the present accomplishments.
